summary: TRANSMISSION HAS UNDERGONE SEVERAL RECALLS.  WITH THE CURRENTLY 56,000 MILES, THE VEHICLE IS STUCK IN PARK AND WILL NOT SHIFT INTO DRIVE.  PREVIOUS COMPLAINTS TO JEEP HAS BEEN MADE OF HARD SHIFTING, DELAY FROM STOP THEN ACCELERATING AT LIGHT, SLOW LAUNCH AND HARD JERKING FROM GEAR-TO-GEAR AT TIMES.  ALL RECALLS HAVE BEEN ADDRESSED AND UP TO DATE; HOWEVER, TRANSMISSION ISN'T WORKING PROPERLY.      LITERALLY SCARED OF THIS VEHICLE NOW.      SERVICE HAS BEEN CONDUCTED ACCORDINGLY.  PRIOR SERVICE CONDUCTED AT JEEP SERVICE DEPARTMENT AND SERVICE TECHS HAVE STATED THAT NOTHING IS WRONG WITH THE TRANSMISISON.
